about_the_game:
In a world where time and space are in turmoil, many captivating stories unfold. In the brand-new DLC Blade Souls, the two sisters, Light Spirit and Dark Spirit, embark on a journey to discover their true selves, and the tangled web of love and hatred among other heroes gradually unfolds. The DLC features the new heroes Light Spirit/Dark Spirit, introducing fresh mechanics and various build styles; a complete four-chapter story mode offers multiple choices determining the ultimate fate of Light Spirit/Dark Spirit.



Formed by the Divine Sword - Amethyst Blade, Light Spirit is the sword, and Dark Spirit is the scabbard; they are two souls united as one, intertwined in mutual dependence. From then on, they wander the mortal realm, seeking their own paths to enlightenment, in hopes of separating and achieving individual fulfillment. In battle, Light Spirit/Dark Spirit can switch between each other, each sister possessing unique advantages that complement each other.



The special Sword Soul system of Light Spirit/Dark Spirit affects card energy consumption. The higher the Sword Soul's power, the less energy Light Spirit's attack cards consume, while the energy cost of skill cards increases, but they receive additional bonuses. Conversely, DrajSpirit's skill cards will consume less energy with higher Sword Soul power, while her attack cards enjoy enhanced bonuses.

Furthermore, Light Spirit/Dark Spirit offers various gameplay styles and builds, such as combo attacks, stacking poisons, disorientation, invisibility, and more. The flexibility in building strategies welcomes players to experiment and explore!
